short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjust colors on web pages to accommodate different types of colorblindness.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ColorSight is a Chrome extension that allows users to adjust web page colors to accommodate different types of colorblindness. Users can select their colorblindness profile and enable/disable color adjustments with a single click. With ColorSight, users can enjoy a better browsing experience without having to strain their eyes or struggle with distinguishing between different colors.
